template <typename T, typename L>
class vsip::impl::Stored_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/stored_block.hpp

Stored_block is a block-like type that stores its data in (local) storage. The default storage is Allocated_storage.

Specializations:
Stored_block<T,Layout<D,O,Stride_unit_dense,F>>
